rationale: Badis blosyrus is known from only few localities of Assam, Nagaland, in India, and may be present in West Bengal. Presence in Bhutan may be inferred. More research is needed to validate the population and distribution of this species. It is assessed as Least Concern, but this should be revised if further information confirming a more restricted distribution arrises.
evaluator: Jha, B.R., Allen, D.J., Datta, N.C., Britz, R., Dey, S.C. & Vishwanath, W.
